item.title: Ways to improve performance within budget constraints
item.description: Say in a situtation where budget is fixed, what will you do to improve system performance? I came out several solutions to this at first, later I came out with more thoughts. I list them here for later reference. create selective indexes partition tables materialized view asynchrous processing: put non real-time operations as a job queue, spread jobs to non business hours, non peak loading time etc.
